name: GGPG (GAIM plugin using GPG)
short_description: GAIM encryption plugin using GPG (PGP clone). It works transparently and smoothly. Automatically establishes secure conversations with other enabled users, passes keys (if enabled) and eventually will allow you to specify your own keys to use.
